traits.name: Blessing of Orcus
traits.desc: Black orcs have advantage on saving throws against the spells and effects of undead creatures.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The black orc champion is a 7th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared: * 1st level (4 slots): command, detect evil and good, false life, protection from evil and good, shield of faith * 2nd level (3 slots): magic weapon, silence, protection from poison

traits.name: Unholy Strike
traits.desc: Once on each of the black orc champion’s turns when it hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the champion can cause the attack to deal an extra 13 (3d8) necrotic damage to the target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The black orc champion makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Each enemy within 30 feet of the champion must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw on the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

actions.name: Parry
actions.desc: The black orc champion adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the champion must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
